subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The noble idea of limiting the Baseball Hall of Fame to the truly elite is a fantasy as the writers who vote for players continue to wrestle with the residue of the game’s steroids era.
snippet: The noble idea of limiting the Baseball Hall of Fame to the truly elite is a fantasy as the writers who vote for players continue to wrestle with the residue of the game’s steroids era.
